name: Kings Never Lie
description:
The king lended you a land to fill with wheat! How kind!!!

Almost perfect had he told you he will be stealing your money...

Plant wheat and sell it, then train soldiers to fight the king for the land. Victory will be ours!

Tutorial Images -PLEASE READ ALL

The brown blocks are available , left click them to plant

Wait for it to get yellow and sell it with a left click

Once in a while the king will show up, left click on him many times to get coins from him

When the 'ADD ARMY' bar is ready, left click to trade all your coins for soldiers,

if your army is stronger than king's, he won't be able to steal anymore

When your army is stronger you can buy the land for 1500 coins and win the game

PS: No cheat available in fullscreen ;)
